content: top down lett-lopi vest by védís jónsdóttir adapted by chris wass adapted for top-down knitting and additional sizes inch measurements are rounded for ease in sizing choice for the us original centimeter measurements used in pattern instructions for accuracy to original pattern gauge sizes s m l xl 1x 2x chest 82 87 91 96 101 106 cm chest inches approx 32 34 36 38 40 42 in length to underarm 31 32 33 34 35 36 cm length inches approx 12 12 5 13 13 5 14 14 5 materials létt-lopi - 50 g balls or other worsted weight yarn main color a = 4 4 5 5 6 6 color b = 1 1 1 1 1 1 color c = 1 1 1 1 1 1 2 stitch markers 4½ mm us 7 circular needles 60-80 cm or 24-32 in 3½ mm us 4 circular needles 60-80 cm or 24-32 in gauge 18 sts and 24 row = 10 x 10 cm measured over st st using 4½ mm needles note sweater is worked from the top down in one piece yoke is worked in the round increases indicated in the chart at the split for the underarm work is back and forth briefly then joined for body body is worked in the round from underarm to bottom edge round begins and ends at right side of body but on yoke round begins and ends on right side of back moss stitch row 1 *k1 p1* to end row 2 p the k sts k the p sts repeat row 1 and 2 neckband with 3½ mm needle magic loop cast on 68 70 72 74 76 78 sts work 4 rnds moss st k 1 round increasing evenly spaced 16 17 18 19 20 21 sts => 84 87 90 93 96 99 sts yoke switch to larger needle work patt and increases from chart as indicated 224 232 240 248 256 264 sts work back 64 67 70 73 76 79 sts bobble 48 49 50 51 52 53 sts for left shoulder work front 64 67 70 73 76 79 sts bobble 48 49 50 51 52 53 sts for right shoulder body work back and forth in st st 4 row for back and 3 for front leave main yarn attached to back at the end of the 4th row on back cast on 10 11 12 13 14 15 sts for left underarm placing top down lett-lopi vest page 1 marker in the center of co sts using the yarn from the back and left to join to work front stitches cast on 10 11 12 13 14 15 sts for right underarm placing marker in the center of co sts 148 156 164 172 180 188 sts work body for 1 2 3 4 5 6 cm if adding short row for bust shaping do so now decrease 2 sts one on each side of marker skp k2tog knit to next
